transcript.comment: CHI and MIT are looking out of the window in CHI's room .
CHI and MIT are in the living room
CHI and MIT are at another table. There are crayons and scrap paper on it

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a car parked outside

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: zd o z j e b uu,: b uu

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: h U,: b uu,: b uu

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: turns the dial of the phone several times

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: steps on the toy to look out of the window

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: lifts CHI up in the air

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the swimming pool in the complex

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: turns CHI around and walks him to the living room

u.speaker: MIT
u.notes: this toy (Osooji zoo-san = cleaning elephant) has a roller that sweeps in small paper-made objects, such as bananas and pencils
u.flatTier: gets up and brings back a toy elephant from the other side of the room

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the elephant in the book

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: opens the back of the elephant and takes out a banana

u.speaker: OPR
u.flatTier: points at three other pieces that go with the elephant toy

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the piece CHI has

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at Doraemon (= a cartoon character)

u.flatTier: 6 z o b o I z u
points at a picture of fire fighters

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: runs his finger on the water coming out of the hose

u.flatTier: m,$ b o s o,: k

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: s uu n o,: p E

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at Anpanman (= a cartoon character)

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: <aft> walks to the middle of the room and picks up another paper object for the toy elephant

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: comes back with the paper object

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at two other objects on the floor

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: puts the objects on a toy train

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: places another object on the train

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: passes the object that fell off the train to MIT

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: rolls the toy elephant over the small objects

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: opens the elephant's back and takes out the paper pieces

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: moves Osooji zoo-san over the small objects

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: picks up lint from the carpet and hands it to MIT

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a small piece on the floor

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: opens the elephant, takes out a banana piece and hands it to MIT

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: gives MIT the rest of the objects

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: lines up the pieces on the floor

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: holds the elephant and moves it over the paper pieces

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: opens the elephants back and takes out the pieces

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: lines up the pieces and hands the elephant to CHI

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: moves the elephant over the pieces

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a piece on the floor

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: tries to move the elephant backwards

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: moves the pieces in front of the elephant

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: turns the elephant and moves it backwards

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: moves the pieces in front of the elephant again

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: squeezes the objects in the elephant's body from the bottom

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: moves the toy over the small objects

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: puts some of the objects in front of the elephant

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: approaches the tape recorder and points at it

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a Japanese alphabet poster on the wall

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: runs to the poster and points at a picture of eyeglasses

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: runs to another poster of Japanese characters with pictures

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a picture of a TV set

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: vaguely points at the TV cabinet in the room

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: runs to the tape recorder and points at it

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: draws a square in the air

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at the picture of TV on the poster again

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: sits down in front of the Doodle Table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: stamps a triangle on the board

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: takes a writing tool with a ball

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: hides the square stamp under the Doodle Table

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: moves the table and sees the stamp

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: hides another stamp while CHI is drawing

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: returns the table back to its original position

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: hides a different stamp under the table

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: shows CHI a writing tool that looks like a fat crayon

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: hides the crayon under the table

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: opens the lid of a toy case behind CHI and looks inside

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: returns the table back in position

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: gives MIT the crayon shaped writing tool

stamps a triangle on the car

u.flatTier: gives the crayon back to MIT

u.flatTier: takes out a plastic building block

u.flatTier: presses the block against the surface of the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: w eI b uu b b uu,:

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: hides the block under the table

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: stamps the block on the table

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: lifts the table and moves it in the air

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at a picture of a frog on the poster

u.speaker: MIT
u.flatTier: points at an apple on the poster

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: climbs on the slide to reach the top part of the poster

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: points at a picture of crayons

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: points to the other side of the room

u.speaker: CHI
u.flatTier: walks to a table with crayons

u.flatTier: takes all the crayons out of the container

u.flatTier: E,: b uu b b uu,:
